snippet: Franck Cammas moved within touching distance of victory in the Volvo Ocean Race when his French entry Groupama triumphed in the Lorient in-port race on home waters in Saturday.
abstract: Franck Cammas moves within touching distance of victory in the Volvo Ocean Race when his French entry Groupama triumphs in the Lorient in-port race on home waters.
lead_paragraph: Franck Cammas moved within touching distance of victory in the Volvo Ocean Race when his French entry Groupama triumphed in the Lorient in-port race on home waters in Saturday.

headline.seo: Frenchman Nears Volvo Ocean Race Title
